rupture.title: We are living a rupture comparable to the invention of writing.
rupture.paragraph2: What remains is what has always been essential:
rupture.conclusion1: This is not learned in tutorials.

futuroAncestral.title: ANCESTRAL FUTURE
futuroAncestral.paragraph1: Each of these tools served humans so naturally that we forgot they were invented.
futuroAncestral.paragraph2: Not because it will disappear, but because it will integrate into what we've always been.
futuroAncestral.notAbout: The future is not about machines.
futuroAncestral.aboutHumans: It's about humans with new tools accessing ancient truths.

entry.line2: Not every work needs to exist.
entry.line3: But if you've come this far,
